'''13w09c''' is the thirteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.5]], released on March 1, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/03/minecraft-snapshot-13w09c/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w09a]] and [[13w09b]] snapshots.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''NBT'''
* Added <code>SeeFriendlyInvisibles</code> tag.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Potion]]s'''
* All potions are now categorized in Creative mode.

=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|effect}}'''
* Amplifier is no longer capped at 4.
* The [[player]] can now remove effects by running <code>/effect <player> <effect> 0</code>.
